keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.CORE

Class Subpopulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.CORE.Subpopulation

  • public class Subpopulation
extends java.lang.Object

    This class represents a subpopulation of rules belonging to a same feature (class).
